Subject: DPI Allowlists not being applied after upgrading the EPP server to 5940
Description: DPI Allowlists not being applied after upgrading the EPP server to 5940.
What_We_Know__c:
The customer experiences the Bug with the Allowlists not working from 5940. We tried applying the workaround:
1. Edit the Cap Policy
2. Re-select the DPI Allowlist items
3. Save

But after Saving if we re-check the policy they are not present.
Next_Steps__c: Waiting on customer to confirm if it works now.
Solution_Comment__c:
Customer confirmed we can close.
Old: Fix will come in next release.
